text: Yallih farmoyti Nabii Mucammad Ã…sa Yallih xaquk Qhuraanay tawraat kitaabay keenil luk yani Nummaysa keenih luk yemeete waqdi kitab kah yontocowwime marak horta Yallih kitab (tawraat kinnuk) Sinnik derre kaa ciggiliseeniih kaal taniimil mataamitinnon, Diggah usun Nabii Mucammad weeloolak kaal tanim Aaxige waa marih innah
